forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 2am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 55, with temperatures rising to around 63 overnight. Southwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 8am. Mostly cloudy. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
